item.title: Workaround solution for inout refcursor parameters for stored procedure in postgresql 11 JDBC
item.description: Workaround solution for inout refcursor parameters for stored procedure in postgresql 11 JDBC The workaround solution mentioned at Issue doesn’t work when inout refcursor parameter is used. Here is my workaround solution for that. CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE sp_test(INOUT results refcursor) LANGUAGE plpgsql SECURITY DEFINER AS $procedure$ begin results :=...

item.title: Atomic Structure
item.description: Atomic Structure Inside Atoms All matter is made up of atoms. Atoms are made up of subatomic particles: protons, neutrons and electrons.
